SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ANSIColor
Contains the 6 ANSI colors codes for the cards
App
Main class to run and manage the game application.
AppUtils
 
BotPlayer
This class contains the implementation of a Bot Player.
Card
Represents a card instance in the game with a color and number value.
CardList
Manages a list of lines, used for printing a pretty card.
Client
This class contains the implementation of a client.
ClientHandler
This class is used to handle all the clients input and outputs.
Deck
Represents a deck of cards used in the game.
Game
Handles the main gameplay logic for Parade.
HumanPlayer
Represents a human player in the game of Parade.
Input
This class contains utility methods for handling user inputs.
Parade
 
Player
This class contains the skeleton that will be common between HumanPlayer and BotPlayer It holds 1 abstract method, which is takeTurn()
Printer
This class contains static methods that display the game state, player hands, the parade, the cards, scoring zones, and the game splashscreen.
Render
This class contains utility methods for rendering text images our cards and the scoring zone.
Server
This class contains the implementation of a Game server.
